author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Title says is all. Went systematically through all `CMSDEPRECATED_X` warnings for `Alignment` subsystem.
   * removed `EventSetup::get()` calls
   * migrated away from deprecated `EDModule`s API
   * put class headers of plugins in the same file as implementation 
   * modernized code
   
Resolves https://github.com/cms-AlCaDB/AlCaTools/issues/48
Part of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/31061

#### PR validation:

`cmssw compiles`

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: Remove deprecation warnings from `Alignment` subsystem
